title: AI Resume Matcher
description: Intelligent resume matching system using machine learning to connect candidates with job opportunities
longDescription: A comprehensive AI-powered platform that analyzes resumes and job descriptions to provide intelligent matching recommendations. The system uses natural language processing and machine learning algorithms to understand skills, experience, and requirements.
challenges: Optimizing matching algorithm for speed and accuracy
solutions: Implemented multi-format PDF and DOCX parsing with fallback strategies
Used vector embeddings and cosine similarity for fast matching
Implemented Redis caching and background job processing

title: CSU Operations Dashboard
description: Enterprise dashboard application for California State University system operations
longDescription: A comprehensive operations dashboard serving 10,000+ users across the CSU system. Provides real-time monitoring, analytics, and management tools for system administrators.
features: Real-time data synchronization across multiple campuses
challenges: Handling real-time updates for 10K+ concurrent users
solutions: Implemented WebSocket connections with automatic reconnection
Built a flexible RBAC system with granular permissions
Set up load balancing and redundancy with health monitoring

title: Component Design System
description: Comprehensive React component library with Storybook documentation
longDescription: A production-ready design system featuring reusable React components, design tokens, and comprehensive documentation. Built with accessibility and developer experience in mind.
features: Dark mode support out of the box
TypeScript support with full type safety
challenges: Managing component complexity and bundle size
solutions: Used Radix UI primitives for accessible foundations
Implemented compound component patterns for flexibility
Set up tree-shaking and analyzed bundle impact
